timelinedescriptionti: Computer maintenance, installation of operating systems and printers.
aboutmedescription: I'm currently pursuing a Computer Science degree at UNESA and hold an intermediate English degree. I have practical experience in IT support, computer maintenance, and knowledge of operating systems (Windows, Linux, and macOS), as well as front-end web development (Vue, Nuxt, Tailwind, and Typescript). I'm proactive and eager to learn. I'm currently working as a front-end web development intern.
descriptionproject: We do any kind of work with wood. Built-in Cabinets - Kitchen Cabinet - Garage Gates - Installation of Doors and Windows - Flooring - Wainscoting and Baseboards - Laminate and Formica - General Chandeliers - Commercial Installation - ETC.
